entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming east 20 before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
